price: Sε Ɔpε a ͻbεma mframa no agyina na wͻn atεm dinn a wͻn nkeka wͻn ho koraa wͻ ɛpo no so. Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ wei mu dema obia ɔsi aboterε na ɔyi (Nyame) ayε.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُسۡكِنِ ٱلرِّيحَ فَيَظۡلَلۡنَ رَوَاكِدَ عَلَىٰ ظَهۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in yasha yus'kini al-rīḥa fayaẓlalna rawākida ʿalā ẓahrihi inna fī dhālika laāyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūrin
translations: He can cause the wind to become still
He can cause the wind to become still
